invoiceFormats.name: Standard
invoiceFormats.description: A basic invoice format with itemized list and total.

invoiceFormats.name: Detailed
invoiceFormats.description: An invoice format with detailed breakdown of items, taxes, and discounts.

invoiceFormats.name: Compact
invoiceFormats.description: A condensed invoice format with minimal information.

invoiceFormats.name: A4
invoiceFormats.description: A condensed invoice format with minimal information.

invoiceFormats.name: Custom
invoiceFormats.description: An invoice format that can be customized with company logo, colors, and layout.
